channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Klarna is about to oust another board member
item.description: Klarna, the Stockholm-based buy-now-pay-later outfit that’s barreling toward an IPO, isn’t done shaking up its board. According to the FT, seven direc...

item.title: Best Binoculars (2024): Nikon, Celestron, Swarovski, Zeiss
item.description: Whether for bird-watching or baseball-spotting, we break down prices and specs to find the best pair for you.

item.title: AWS CEO Matt Garman on generative AI, open source, and closing services

item.title: Best Galaxy S24 Cases (2024): Screen Protectors, Chargers, More
item.description: Protect your new Galaxy smartphone with our favorite cases, screen protectors, and more.

item.title: Ola Electric stock tumbles as complaints ratch up, and market share erodes

item.title: Tony Fadell-backed Plumerai brings on-device AI to home security cameras
item.description: On Wednesday, some Harvard students made headlines by outfitting a pair of Ray-Ban Meta glasses with facial recognition. The DIY project is the latest...

item.title: StrictlyVC comes to TechCrunch Disrupt 2024

item.title: The Best Electric Toothbrushes, Tested and Reviewed (2024)
item.description: These rechargeable and battery-powered models put better oral hygiene within easy reach.

item.title: KitchenAid Promo Code: 15% Off Select Items
item.description: Get 15% off all regular-priced items, such as mixers, dishwashers, microwaves and more, with our KitchenAid discount code.

item.title: This Homemade AI Drone Software Finds People When Search and Rescue Teams Can’t
item.description: British Mountain Rescue workers have developed an automated drone system that can scour a landscape far quicker and more thoroughly than human eyes.
